Outbound network transfer of data matchi.Data: Zeek files.log, Zeek http.log, Zeek ftp.log
Outbound network transfer of data matchi.Action: Monitor Zeek logs (files.log, http.log, ftp.log) for outbound file transfers from potential Linux hosts. Use entropy analysis, regex matching for known patterns (e.g., 'root:', ':/bin/bash', '$[1,5,6]$'), or file size checks to identify potential password/shadow file content being exfiltrated. Investigate transfers to unusual external destinations.

Network activity related to the download.Action: Monitor Zeek logs (http.log, dns.log) for connections to malicious sites or file downloads with names of known Linux credential tools (e.g., 'unshadow', 'johntheripper', 'hashcat'). Correlate DNS lookups for suspicious domains used in tool delivery.
